title: Code Architecture Analysis
description: Analyze current code architecture, identify potential improvements in code organization, modularity, and design patterns.

title: Error Handling and Logging Review
description: Review error handling mechanisms, logging implementation, and error recovery strategies. Ensure comprehensive error tracking and debugging capabilities.

title: Performance Optimization Analysis
description: Identify performance bottlenecks, analyze resource usage, and recommend optimization strategies for better performance.

title: Test Coverage Assessment
description: Evaluate current test coverage, identify gaps in testing, and plan for comprehensive test suite improvements.

title: Documentation Review and Update
description: Review existing documentation, identify gaps, and plan for documentation improvements including API docs, setup guides, and architecture documentation.

title: Security Assessment
description: Review security measures, identify potential vulnerabilities, and recommend security improvements.
